titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100-year anniversary of Big Brothers Big Sisters Southeastern Pennsylvania.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 12/11/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 100-year anniversary of Big Brothers Big Sisters Southeastern Pennsylvania.
